pkgmetadata.longdescription: Statistical Inference in High Dimensional Regression // The goal of SIHR is to provide inference procedures in the high- dimensional setting for (1) linear functionals in generalized linear regression ('Cai et al.' (2019) arXiv:1904.12891, 'Guo et al.' (2020) arXiv:2012.07133, 'Cai et al.' (2021)), (2) conditional average treatment effects in generalized linear regression, (3) quadratic functionals in generalized linear regression ('Guo et al.' (2019) arXiv:1909.01503). (4) inner product in generalized linear regression (5) distance in generalized linear regression.
